trans-unit.source: Represents the value returned from a database comparison operation between Oracle data types, and exposes methods used to perform data type conversions.
trans-unit.target: Representa o valor retornado de uma operação de comparação do banco de dados entre tipos de dados Oracle e expõe os métodos usados para realizar conversões de tipo de dados.

trans-unit.source: The key difference between an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure and a standard **Boolean** value is that, where a standard `Boolean` has two possible values, `true` and `false`, an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure has three possible values, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False>, or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>.
trans-unit.target: A principal diferença entre um <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> estrutura e um padrão **booliano** valor é que, quando um padrão `Boolean` tem dois valores possíveis, `true` e `false`, uma <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> estrutura tem três valores possíveis, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False>, ou <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure does not map to an Oracle `Boolean` data type; it is exposed as a convenience support class.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> estrutura não é mapeado para um Oracle `Boolean` de tipo de dados; ele é exposto como uma classe de suporte de conveniência.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Boolean" /> to be used as the initial value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: O <see langword="Boolean" /> a ser usado como o valor inicial da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure using the specified <see langword="Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> usando o <see langword="Boolean" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="integer" /> to be used as the initial value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: O <see langword="integer" /> a ser usado como o valor inicial da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure using the specified integer.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> usando o inteiro especificado.

trans-unit.source: If `value` is 0, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> is `false`; otherwise it is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se `value` é 0, o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> é `false`; caso contrário, será `true`.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Computes the bitwise AND of two specified <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: Calcula o AND bit a bit de duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> especificadas.

trans-unit.source: The result of the logical AND operation as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: O resultado da operação lógica AND conforme mostrado na tabela a seguir.

trans-unit.source: An object to compare, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Um objeto a ser comparado ou uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Compares this <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure to a specified object and returns an indication of their relative values.
trans-unit.target: Compara essa estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> com um objeto especificado e retorna uma indicação de seus valores relativos.

trans-unit.source: A signed number indicating the relative values of the instance and value.
trans-unit.target: Um número com sinal que indica os valores relativos da instância e do valor.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Any instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean>, regardless of its value, is considered greater than a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Qualquer instância do <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean>, independentemente de seu valor é considerado maior do que uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structures to determine if they are equal.
trans-unit.target: Compara duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> para determinar se elas são iguais.

trans-unit.source: The object to be compared.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: Compares the supplied object parameter to the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Compara o parâmetro de objeto fornecido com o <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if object is an instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> and the two are equal; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o objeto for uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> e os dois forem iguais; caso contrário <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structures to determine if they are equal.
trans-unit.target: Compara duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> para determinar se elas são iguais.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if the two instances are equal or <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> if the two instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> que será <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> se as duas instâncias forem iguais ou <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> se as duas instâncias não forem iguais.

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se qualquer instância de <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> for nula, o <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> do <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> será <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.

trans-unit.source: Represents a false value that can be assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> property of an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Representa um valor falso que pode ser atribuído à propriedade <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> de uma instância da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False> field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False> campo é um <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> constante da estrutura.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para essa instância.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: Um código de hash do inteiro assinado de 32 bits.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" />.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> atual é <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see langword="Value" /> is <see langword="False" />, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se <see langword="Value" /> é <see langword="False" />, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A> is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>, this property still is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A> é <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>, essa propriedade é `false`.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether or not the value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure is null.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o valor da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> é nulo ou não.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> value of the structure is **Null**, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> é o valor da estrutura de **nulo**, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" />.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> atual é <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see langword="Value" /> is <see langword="True" />, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se <see langword="Value" /> é <see langword="True" />, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A> is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>, this property still is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A> é <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>, essa propriedade é `false`.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Compares two instances of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> to determine if they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Compara duas instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> para determinar se elas não são iguais.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if the two instances are not equal or <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> if the two instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> que será <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> se as duas instâncias não forem iguais ou <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> se as duas instâncias forem iguais.

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se qualquer instância de <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> for nula, o <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> do <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> será <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.

trans-unit.source: Represents a null value that can be assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> property of an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Representa um valor nulo que pode ser atribuído à propriedade <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> de uma instância da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null> field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null> campo é um <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> constante da estrutura.

trans-unit.source: Represents a value of one that can be assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> property of an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Representa um valor de um que pode ser atribuído à propriedade <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> de uma instância da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.One> field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.One> campo é um <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> constante da estrutura.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Performs a ones complement operation on the supplied <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: Executa uma operação de complemento de um nas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> fornecidas.

trans-unit.source: The one's complement of the supplied <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: O complemento de um do <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> fornecido.

trans-unit.source: If the <see langword="Boolean" /> contains a null value the result also is a null value.
trans-unit.target: Se o <see langword="Boolean" /> contém um valor nulo, o resultado também é um valor nulo.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.target: Compara duas instâncias de um <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> quanto à igualdade.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if the two instances are equal or <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> if the two instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> que será <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> se as duas instâncias forem iguais ou <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> se as duas instâncias não forem iguais.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Boolean" /> set to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="Boolean" /> definido como o <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> do <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> contains a null value.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> contém um valor nulo.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber" /> to be converted to an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber" /> a ser convertido para uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Converts the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber" /> parameter to an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Converte o parâmetro <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber" /> em uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure whose value equals the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber.Value" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> cujo valor é igual ao da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber.Value" /> do parâmetro <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber" />.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber> is 0, the value of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> is `false`; otherwise, the value of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor da <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber> é 0, o valor de <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> é `false`; caso contrário, o valor da <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> é `true`.

trans-unit.source: A string to be converted to an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres a ser convertida em uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Converts a string to an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Converte uma cadeia de caracteres em uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure whose value equals the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> cujo valor é igual ao <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber.Value" /> do parâmetro <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure to be tested.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> a ser testada.

trans-unit.source: Used to test the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> to determine whether it is false.
trans-unit.target: Usado para testar o <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> do <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> para determinar se ele é falso.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the supplied parameter <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is false; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o parâmetro <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> fornecido for falso, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.IsFalse?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.IsFalse?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Boolean" /> value to be converted to <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see langword="Boolean" /> a ser convertido em <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Converts a <see langword="Boolean" /> value to an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte um valor <see langword="Boolean" /> em um <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> value containing 0 or 1.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> valor que contém 0 ou 1.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Compares two instances of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> for inequality.
trans-unit.target: Compara duas instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> quanto à desigualdade.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if the two instances are not equal or <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> if the two instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> que será <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> se as duas instâncias não forem iguais ou <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> se as duas instâncias forem iguais.

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se qualquer instância de <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> for nula, o <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> do <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> será <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.NotEquals%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%2CSystem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.NotEquals%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%2CSystem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> on which the NOT operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> em que a operação NOT é executada.

trans-unit.source: Performs a NOT operation on an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Executa uma operação NOT em um <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> with the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /><see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if argument was true, <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" /> if argument was null, and <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> com o <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /><see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> se argumento for verdadeiro, <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" /> se o argumento for nulo e <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Performs a one's complement operation on the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Executa uma operação de complemento de unidade no <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: The one's complement of the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: O complemento de um do <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.OnesComplement%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.OnesComplement%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure to be tested.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> a ser testada.

trans-unit.source: Used to test the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> to determine whether it is true.
trans-unit.target: Usado para testar o <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> do <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> para determinar se ele é verdadeiro.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the supplied parameter <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is true; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o parâmetro <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> fornecido for verdadeiro, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.IsTrue?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.IsTrue?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Performs a bitwise OR operation on the two specified <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: Executa uma operação OR bit a bit nas duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> especificadas.

trans-unit.source: The result of the bitwise OR operation as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: O resultado da operação OR bit a bit conforme mostrado na tabela a seguir.

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value of <paramref name="x" /></term><description> Value of <paramref name="y" /></description><description> Result
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Valor de <paramref name="x" /></term><description> Valor de <paramref name="y" /></description><description> Resultado

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to be converted.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.String" /> a ser convertido.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of a logical value to its <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Converte a representação <see cref="T:System.String" /> especificada de um valor lógico para seu <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> equivalente.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure containing the parsed value.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> que contém o valor analisado.

trans-unit.source: Converts the current <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> to a string.
trans-unit.target: Converte o <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> atual para uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o valor do <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: If the value is null, the string contains a null value.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for nulo, a cadeia de caracteres conterá um valor nulo.

trans-unit.source: Represents a true value that can be assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> property of an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Representa um valor verdadeiro que pode ser atribuído à propriedade <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> de uma instância da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True> field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True> campo é um <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> constante da estrutura.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure's value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é somente para leitura.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" />; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> é <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: Performs a bitwise exclusive-OR operation on the supplied parameters.
trans-unit.target: Executa uma operação OR exclusiva bit a bit nos parâmetros fornecidos.

trans-unit.source: The results of the logical XOR operation as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Os resultados da operação XOR lógica conforme mostrado na tabela a seguir.

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value of <paramref name="x" /></term><description> Value of <paramref name="y" /></description><description> Result
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Valor de <paramref name="x" /></term><description> Valor de <paramref name="y" /></description><description> Resultado

trans-unit.source: Represents a value of zero that can be assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> property of an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Representa um valor de zero que pode ser atribuído à propriedade <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> de uma instância da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Zero> field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Zero> campo é um <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> constante da estrutura.
